document.text:
From: kathryn milofkky 
To:'
Subject: BRITISH TV REQUEST Important 
Date: Mon, 08 Jun 2020 19:32:20 +0000 
Dear Mr Berman 
I  am Kathryn Milofsky a  producer for IN News based in NY.We are the largest commercial channel in the 
UK similar in style stature to NBC. 
We would be honored to do an interview with you today via Skype for about 10 minutes about your 
request to interview Prince Andrew re the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein. The recent MLA request. 
The interview would air on our flagship News at Ten Broadcast which is watched by millions. 
ITV News is made by ITN, which has a  global reputation as a  provider of independent, objective broadcast 
news. We are known for delivering powerful, authoritative coverage which is free from any political ownership. 
ITV News has the biggest reach of any commercial news provider in the UK and broadcasts to 8 million 
viewers each day. We are the main commercial competition to the BBC. Our recent interview with Meghan 
Markle had 44million views and millions watched the interview on tv. 
We are proud to be the network that best reaches the non-metropolitan elite in the UK. Online, the ITV 
News Facebook and Twitter pages are now at 1.8m followers each and growing, with Facebook views pulling 
in an average of 55m average per month, with 5m monthly video views on Twitter. The ITV News website 
has an average of 30m page views each month. 
I  so hope you can do an interview with us. 
Kind Regards 
Kathryn Milofsky 
Producer ITV News 
EFTA00018556
